name: The Last Werewolf (itch)
description:
You are the last ever Werewolf, the town is very well aware what you are and they are bent on driving you to extinction! You must survive the night until morning.... nerf Mcree.

police will shoot you on sight and civilians will flee in terror, every kill restores health and increases your score. Stay alive until the timer runs out.

Music: 'Voices' by Kickhat
